intro: I'm open to collaboration, consulting, and creative discussions. If you have an idea to turn into a solution with AI and a team‑driven approach, reach out via email, phone, or social.

hero.heading: Who am I?
hero.name: Zoran Knežević
hero.tagline: IT enthusiast with 20+ years connecting infrastructure, support, design, and process optimization. I’m not a hardcore programmer, but I align people, tools, and AI assistants to turn ideas into working solutions.
hero.story: I started in 2005 on the MyCity.rs forum, opening my first IT account and diving into this world. That’s when I discovered Linux and set up my first card‑sharing server. Today—using a modern AI toolchain—I assemble web, desktop, and mobile solutions without needing to be a hardcore coder.

pillars.title: Value-First
pillars.desc: Practical solutions that solve real problems

pillars.title: Flexible Approach
pillars.desc: From idea to production, with the right tools

pillars.title: All Types of Web Applications
pillars.desc: I build complex web applications: e-commerce platforms, SaaS solutions, dashboard applications, PWAs, real-time systems, API integrations, and custom enterprise solutions

skills.heading: Technical Skills
skills.intro: These are the tools I most often use with AI pair-programming and ready-made templates. Percentages reflect my confidence when assembling within this ecosystem—not a claim of seniority.
skills.toolboxIntro: Essential tools and services I use for deployment, database management, and automation

projects.heading: Portfolio
projects.intro: The projects below were created through a mix of off‑the‑shelf services, AI assistance, and solo work. I choose solutions that deliver the most value to users, while coding to the level required to make the idea work.

items.title: Travel
items.description: Comprehensive travel platform featuring 80+ best websites for flights, accommodation, transport, and activities in one place. Organized by categories with detailed reviews and links to providers.

items.title: Courses
items.description: Educational platform for online courses and learning resources. Centralized place to access quality educational content and courses.

items.title: German Language
items.description: Comprehensive platform for learning German language with interactive lessons, exercises, tests, and progress tracking. Features personalized courses, grading system, and detailed learning analytics.

items.title: Računi
items.description: Offline-first PWA for scanning fiscal receipts, storing warranties, and tracking household spending. I lead the product vision, Supabase sync architecture, and AI-assisted OCR/analytics experiences.

items.title: Osnovci
items.description: Holistic learning platform for elementary students combining mastery-based lessons, parent dashboards, and AI coaching. I architect the multi-tenant curriculum CMS, real-time classroom automations, and progress analytics.

items.title: Balkan Remote
items.description: Career hub for remote talent from the Balkans: tax calculator, job aggregator, resources, tools, and a Q&A forum.

items.title: Pumpaj Video Downloader
items.description: Video downloader orchestrated by combining a Next.js client, Express API, and Electron shell with AI pair‑programming. Supports 100+ platforms and shows real‑time progress.

items.title: SEF eInvoices
items.description: Complete e‑invoicing system for the Serbian SEF. Solo project where I handle architecture, integrations, QA, and coding with AI assistance (dashboard, UBL 2.1, API, webhooks, audit trail).

items.title: PDF Scraper
items.description: Open‑source tool for indexing PDF documents—led concept, automation, and orchestration, with AI assistants helping on scrape routines and localized UI.

items.title: MMA Balkan
items.description: Regional hub for the MMA community with news, events, and corporate partnerships. My role: architecture, automated ingest pipelines, and AI‑supported content.

items.title: eFina
items.description: Fintech solution for the Croatian market: e‑invoices, fiscalization, and a cash‑flow dashboard. I led product discovery and integrations while AI agents covered repetitive code.

items.title: SNS Scandals List
items.description: Database with over 324 recorded or reported scandals and affairs. Visual representation of estimated damage, categorization by areas, and search and filter capabilities.

items.title: Public Twitter Bot Accounts Database
items.description: Public database of Twitter bot accounts. Transparent platform for accessing information about bot accounts and their activity.

items.title: Rade Cosic Books
items.description: E-commerce platform for book sales with modern design and user experience. Implemented with focus on simple navigation and fast book search.

items.title: David Knežević Portfolio
items.description: Premium fitness coaching portfolio with personalized programs, client success stories, and comprehensive training information. Modern design focused on conversion and professional image.

items.title: Nestašica
items.description: Satirical data hub that imagines shortages and responses tied to potential sanctions on NIS in Serbia. I use it as a parody dashboard showing how transparent alerts, filters, and narratives could look.

items.title: Filmovi & Serije
items.description: Curated catalogue of movies and TV shows with genre-based recommendations, watchlist support, and detailed content cards—ideal for discovering new titles and sharing picks.

items.title: Vremenska Prognoza
items.description: Modern Next.js 16 web application for tracking weather forecasts and air quality in the Balkans with real-time data from multiple sources. Features 7-day forecasts, interactive maps, AQI monitoring, and smart alerts.

items.title: Brojac Vozila
items.description: Vehicle counting application for tracking and analyzing traffic data with real-time monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Pisma
items.description: Digital platform for time-locked letters that combines modern technology with the nostalgia of handwritten correspondence. Features personalized wax seals, audio messages, vintage paper effects, QR code tracking, and 3D unboxing experience.

items.title: Sipka Group
items.description: Premium website for property investment group in New Zealand. Features property portfolio, company history, and available spaces with modern design and interactive maps.

items.title: Ketering Beograd
items.description: Exclusive catering service for corporate events and private celebrations in Belgrade. Website with menus, food gallery, personalized offers, and multi-language support (Serbian, English, Russian).

items.title: Bidon
items.description: Modern PWA application for tracking and recording fuel dispensing from tanks. Ideal for agricultural farms and transport companies. Features tank management with animated fuel level display, vehicle records, consumption reports by vehicle and sector, and PWA support for mobile installation.

items.title: Block Manager for Twitter/X
items.description: Chrome extension for managing blocked users on Twitter/X platform. Modern glassmorphism UI with dark/light themes, Alt+B shortcut for quick blocking, advanced manager with search and filtering, visual statistics, smart tagging, and backup system. Supports import/export and bulk actions.

contact.heading: Contact Me
contact.intro: I’m open to collaboration, consulting, and brainstorming. If you have an idea to turn into a solution with AI and a team‑driven approach, reach out via email, phone, or social.
